author: Brett Samuels
title: Trump resists pressure to declare nationwide stay-at-home order
description: President Trump is holding back on declaring a nationwide stay-at-home order, even as some governors resist imposing restrictions that Trump's top public health officials say are needed to slow the spread of the coronavir...
